item.title: Introduce Your Hometown
item.description: tips How to describe your hometown, follow these points will help you get there Introducing your hometown briefly Adding background and details about your hometown Talking about what you like or dislike about it Talking about how it’s changed over time Briefly I like in a __ (city, town, village...) Background and details Like or dislike history and changes ____ has changed a lot in the last 20 years ____ is almost unrecognisible compared to 20 years ago it hasn't changed much in the last 20 years

item.title: Self Introduction
